title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor and clicking on the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field is left blank.
EB: When using build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor and clicking on the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor using build 20011106. 
2. Click on the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field. 
Expected outcome: The field should default to the current type in the editor.
